data.title: Jonathan Kydd
data.meta_site_name: Jonathan Kydd - Writer Actor Voice Over Film-maker Musician
data.text:
News

(This is Cliff on the left. He plays guitar in my band the Rudy Vees. He is a top player. And arranger. And makes my songs sound better tan I ever imagined they could be. Which is good.)

STOP PRESS MY NEW BOOK “GO QUICKER SOUND SLOWER” IS OUT ON AMAZON

It’s a humorous 3 month diary of a voice over/actor. Here’s a link

https://amzn.eu/d/cawZfWt

Hello there. I’m Jonathan Kydd. I voice stuff. (i’ve done over 70 video games) I was in Toy Story That Time Forgot (all info on this site) playing Ray Gon

I act. I’ve made two award winning shorts….Ahaaaarrrr and Shakespeare’s Wart

On TikTok I’m @jonathankyddcfc and @jonathankydd

https:///www.tiktok.com@jonathankyddcfc?_t=8jQ66Y7Y9ce&_r=1

I do the Chelsea Fanbite, a two minute critique of each Chelsea match.

I podcast on the Chelsea Fancast

I write books about my father Sam Kydd available at www.Samkydd.com and on Amazon

https://www.samkydd.com

I sing in a band called The Rudy Vees

http://www.jonathankydd.com/the-rudy-vees/

Also available on here and on You Tube as The Rudy Vees

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMR9cyhbZbi_C8mMV8FLNPA

I have a youtube site for myself Jonathan Kydd which feature whole animation episodes of Bangers and Mash and Astrofarm and whole episodes of Pipkins

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU-cgTjSrilX3jedS-QaNfQ

I’m on X as @jonathankyddcfc and @vant_howard Jonathankyddactor and @chelseafancast

The Singing Dentists are on You Tube

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTJM383jpJcSdJKGPRvnXiQ

As is a football site @jonathankyddchelseachannel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEqnXPXT_Rw84wfmZIH14gQ

Here’s a visual showreel of me voicing and stuff I’ve done as a voice over/actor ie games and promos and corporates and ads and cartoons is at the top here on the right.

Recent Vids I’ve made

My VAR comedy vid

https://youtu.be/jupspn-hk18

Chelsea’s Graham Potter is advised by me how not to do a Press conference

https://youtu.be/bf09kS-P0Ss

Grindlay Ross. Newscaster.

https://youtu.be/lprHkiwVU6o

I have a Voice Over Studio with Pro Tools and Logic and a Neumann microphone with a Focusrite Red7. That’s it below.

If you want to book me for voice overs, videos games, cartoons, documentaries etc I’m with

Harvey Voices…..

Telephone: +44 (0) 20 7952 4361

Email: emma@harveyvoices.co.uk

My acting is represented by Shane Collins…0207 253 1010 shane@shanecollins.co.uk

This below is a video of the series ‘Stuff Wot I Did” in which I show a vid and talk about it in a two minute window. Here’s the first. It’s about the legendary “Ferrero Rocher” advert I voiced.

https://youtu.be/1FrSLNQP5ws

I’m a hugely experienced actor/voice over – been doing this since 1986 – Here are a few people I’ve worked for in the last few years…

Talksport ..Cadbury …Times Radio….Premier league ..Champions league. BBC World..BBC Earth, BBC First, Animal Planet. DMax.. C5! Al-Jazeera! Nat Geo. Film 4. Film Fear. ‘Africa’s Deadliest’ and Human Ape Little Monkey House’ documentaries for Nat Geo Wild.And ‘Wonderfully Weird!‘ And Robert Kennedy for Green Rock!’ And ‘Tuna Wars!’ BBC News ‘Brexit!‘ ‘World’s Toughest Prisons’, for 5 Spike! “Demon’s Souls 3″ Video game ‘Shark V Tuna!‘ ‘Panorama’ “and ‘World of Warcraft Battle of Azeroth‘. Discovery ‘Wheeler Dealers’ Salvage Hunters Quest ‘Combat Dealers‘ ‘Airport Security’ ‘Mr Bean’! ‘5USA’ ‘NCIS’..’Discovery ID’….’WW2 Origins’ doco … Food Network ..”The Real Black Panther” ……….. And “Wild Central America” for Nat Geo and more “Airport Security” docos…… Renault Talkradio Just Eat, Titanic Air Force One Predator SharkvWhale, O2, ITV, C5, Fox, Really, “Slime!” Panorama, “Movies and Film” doco episodes for Sky Arts, . Britbox “World’s most dangerous Jellyfish” and World’s most powerful bites” docos for NatGeo and “Cold War and the Cinema” for Sky Arts.. Shark Attack Files for Disney. J

I directed a Zoom reading of ‘A Christmas Carol’ in 2023 starring Nicholas le Prevost.

I did 3 episodes of Charles Paris for Radio 4. A Deadly Habit! I played three characters. One an obese asthmatic cockney stage door keeper at a West End Theatre. Starring Bill Nighy. It won a comedy award!!!

Did an ep of Angel soon to be seen on AppleTV I’m a bouncer at a Ballroom!

Here’s my two minute cutdown animation reel!

SEVERAL ONGOING PROJECTS:

New musical with Andy Street Working Title ‘Mrs Wallace’. Opening scenes written!

Record a country album. Done one track! “Gold at the end of the Rainbow.”

Do an audio book of my father’s first book “For You the War is Over”. Done half!

Finish my screen play! And film it! Halfway through!

Do a doco of my father’s life and career.

THAT’S THAT! MEANWHILE…….

The audio version of my musical ‘Doodle’ starring Jennie Jacobs as Weaver and me as Filbert Tweed and my dad Sam Kydd is on the right

Here’s the trailer!

Here’s a still from comedy series ‘Vikingsgane’ (‘Norsemen’ on Netflix) that I was in, in Norway! I was playing the nicest man in England! I got killed! Note the axe! There’s a bit on the showreel below
